Another dump question, how can I install: probably need root privileges for that
you should enable the partner repository and install 'acroread'
don't use medibuntu it's obsolete, that's why the partner repository is there
do you really need it or do you simply need to read the contents of a iso file?
when using wine you can simply add a path (also an iso) as a cd-rom drive
mount the iso as: "sudo mount -o loop /path/to/iso/thefile.iso /mnt/iso" (if the directory /mnt/iso exists)
press add, browse to /mnt/iso, click show advanced, set type to cd-rom
